document.masterDocTitle: Pamphagidae (Orthoptera: Acridoidea) from the Palaearctic Region: taxonomy, classification, keys to genera and a review of the tribe Nocarodeini I. Bolívar

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Pamphagidae (Orthoptera: Acridoidea) from the Palaearctic Region: taxonomy, classification, keys to genera and a review of the tribe Nocarodeini I. Bolívar

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paranocarodes tolunayi Karabağ, 1949
:
Karabağ 1958 : 117
;
Weidner 1969 : 158
;
Presa & Garcia 1983 : 24
.

Paranocarodes atympanicus
n. sp. :
Ramme 1951 : 278
, 285, 427, partim (female nymph holotype ). syn. nov.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality.
Turkey , Ankara , Kızılcahamam , Gökdere.
Holotype :
male ( MfN ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
TURKEY : Anatolien , [ Ankara ], Kisilcahamam [ Kızılcahamam ], Gökdere ,
25.5.1940
, 1♂ ( Holotype ), 1♂ , 1♀ nymph ( Paratypes ) (leg. T. Karabağ ) ( MfN )
;
Angora [ Ankara ], 1♀ nymph ( Holotype of
Paranocarodes atympanicus
) (leg. Wiedemann ) ( MfN )
;
Ankara , Kızılcahamam ,
25.5.1940
, 1♂ , 1♀ nymph,

, 1♀ nymph [ Topotypes ] (leg. T. Karabağ ) ( NHMUK )
;
Ankara , Kızılcahamam , Gökdere ,
25.5.1940
, 1♂ ( Paratype ) (leg. T. Karabağ , det. Ramme as
Paranocarodes
n.sp. ); ibidem 1♂ , 3♀ nymphs [ Topotypes ] (leg. T. Karabağ ) ( AÜZM )
;
Bolu , Kındıra Köyü , Güvenlik Yaylası ,
1570 m
,

, 1♂ , 3♀
;
Ankara , Kızılcahamam , Güvem Köyü ,
1100 m
,
28.5.1997
, 1♂ (leg. M. Akçay ) (
Ünal , 2009
)
;
Bolu , Gerede , Naldöken Tepesi , 1900,
4.6.2008
, 1♂ , 1♀ (leg. M. Ünal )
;
Ankara , Kızılcahamam , Soğuksu Milli Parkı ,
9.6.1993
, 1♂ (leg. M. Ünal ) (AİBÜEM).
Distribution. Known from N. Turkey : along the Köroğlu Mountains in Ankara and Bolu provinces ( Fig. 840 ).

Remarks. The author and the date of this species were given as “ Karabağ, 1949 ” by Karabağ (1958) , Weidner (1969) , Demirsoy (1973 , 1977 ), Presa & Garcia (1983) , Otte (1994) , Ünal (1999) . But, Karabağ (1949: 66) gave this species for the first time as “
Paranocarodes tolunayi Ram
(n.sp.)”. Karabağ also added a short note just below this species: “Identification and description of this species that found by us from 1600 m . height of the Kızılcahamam forests, were made by Ramme”. Therefore it is clear that the author of this species must be Ramme (in Karabağ, 1949 ).

The holotype of
P. atympanicus Ramme
is a female nymph though Ramme (1951: 285) did not mention its nymphal state. There are also 1 female nymph of
P. tolunayi
in the MfN, 1 female nymph in the NHMUK and 3 female nymphs in the AÜZM. They all were compared in detail and concluded that they are certainly identical and probably are members of the same population. Besides, the only known species of
Paranocarodes
in Ankara province is
P. tolunayi
. Considering the similarities of the holotype (female nymph) of
P. atympanicus
it has to be considered synonym of
P. tolunayi tolunayi
. On the other hand the paratype (adult female) of
P. atympanicus
from Denizli Province is
P. karabagi
(see
P. karabagi
above).
